resources.string: Print maps and directions onto\nthe back of your paper phone.
Choose which contacts you want\nto print to your paper phone.\nLong press for settings.
Choose the calendars you want\nto print to your paper phone.\nLong press for settings.
Add the weather for today,\nbased on your location.\nLong press for settings.
Add reminders from your\nGoogle Tasks lists.\nLong press for settings.
Add an empty space to your paper\nphone to capture thoughts and ideas.
Add a screenshot or picture\nto your paper phone.\nLong press to change.
Print cut-out marks to store your\ncontactless card inside your paper phone.
Choose an app to print\nonto your paper phone.\nLong press for settings.
Print maps and directions onto\nthe back of your paper phone.
Tap to select the things you want \nto print to your paper phone.\nLong press an icon for settings.

To fold your phone, lay the page map
side up and fold it in half so the two
 little circles at the bottom of the page
touch.

Then fold in half again so the squares
are touching.

Then fold in half one last time.
Please choose the Google account you wish to use.

This experiment prints a
little paper phone with the
most important information
you'll need for the day.

Just choose the information
you would like to include on
your paper phone and
 hit print.
Practice spending a little time\naway from your phone.
